bookContractor(long, String) - Method in interface suncertify.business.BookingBusinessAdapter
Books a particular Contractor using the combined name and location field as the primary key to locate the record, and an eight digit customer number to update the owner field.

BookContractorCommand - Class in suncertify.business.network.commands
This class extends the abstract command class and implements the execute() method to either update the result variable or store an exception in the exception variable.
BookContractorCommand(long, String) - Constructor for class suncertify.business.network.commands.BookContractorCommand
The constructor takes a record number and customer number and stores them in the respective variables to be used by the execute() method on the server side.

BookingConfigurationDialog - Class in suncertify.presentation.gui
This class extends JDialog and is opened when the application is opened with either "alone" or when no command line argument (flag) is used and uses the sheared ConfigurationPanel and then closed once the configuration parameters are set.

BookingController - Interface in suncertify.presentation
This interface is to be implemented by the controller class used in the model viewer controller design pattern for the presentation tier of the Booking application.
BookingControllerImp - Class in suncertify.presentation
This class implements the BookingController interface and therefore must implement the methods in this interface.
BookingControllerImp(BookingModel, BookingView) - Constructor for class suncertify.presentation.BookingControllerImp
The constructor takes a BookingModel and a BookingModel, then initializes the model and view variables and registers itself with the view as a listener.
BookingControlPanel - Class in suncertify.presentation.gui
This class is used to preform operations on a record that has already been selected in the display table using it's various buttons.

It implements the BookingPanel interface so it can be added to the a BookingGui.
BookingControlPanel() - Constructor for class suncertify.presentation.gui.BookingControlPanel
The default constructor calls the init() method to build the GUI in this panel and initialize its components.

BookingNwServer - Class in suncertify.business.network.server
The class is the socket server responsible for listening and connecting any client that request connection, then passing the socket on to a startService using a thread pool so it can take multiple clients.
BookingNwServer() - Constructor for class suncertify.business.network.server.BookingNwServer
The default constructor that builds the instance to the BookingNwServer.
